title: Did the Star Guardian Quiz but Icon has not appeared anywhere in my account?
body:
So, I did the Star Guardian quiz last night and redeemed my Icon, but when I went to see whether the icon was there in my account, I don't see it anywhere.

**How long does it usually take for this to process?**
_Did I do something wrong?_


My friend got it within an hour or two, but It's been a whole night for me... and still nothing. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 

Every time I take the star guardian quiz, it says that the icon has already been claimed but I don't see it anywhere...
Anyone else having this problem?

I hope this can be solved soon, please and thank you. I'd really like the icon!

replies.body:
I took the quiz last night, and my icon just now showed up.  :D  As long as you took the quiz while signed onto your account through the site, you'll be fine.  It can usually take up to 72 hours to unlock.  Hang tight, you'll get the goodies!

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KIwfkq7E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-07T22:00:34.263+0000)
>
> I took the quiz last night, and my icon just now showed up.  :D  As long as you took the quiz while signed onto your account through the site, you'll be fine.  It can usually take up to 72 hours to unlock.  Hang tight, you'll get the goodies!
> 
> {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Ahh! Thank you so much! I will wait patiently then <3
It says it could take up to a few days to deliver the icon, give it some time

> [{quoted}](name=God of the Cats,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=KIwfkq7E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-07T21:13:39.773+0000)
>
> It says it could take up to a few days to deliver the icon, give it some time

Thank you! I will wait then c:
I took the quiz few days a go almost a week, but hte icon is still not showing....what should i do?
The same happens to me i redeemed few days ago and still waitting and nothing...
Chiming in to say I've got the same issue. Still no Icon. Been checking everyday
Same here, I took the quiz 7 days ago. Says it's claimed but alas no pretty icon. I check everyday but still no icon. :( {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
it has been 6 days since i did the quiz and nothing shows up .
